title: I NEED HELP WITH LAUNCHER RIOT PLZ ;-;
body:
i haven't been able to go into a game for a couple of days when i was able to play i just finshed a match then after that when i wen t into another game it wouldn't load i tried to join but it would say network error sometimes or it would just strait crash this is my latest match log plz help me

replies.body:
Given your logs and your network errors that you sometimes receive, this strongly points to some sort of weird connection issue that is dropping your connection to the individual game server you are trying to join.  It's hard to pinpoint exactly why this is occurring, so make sure to complete all of the steps in our [Connection Issues Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664).  The steps there are the most common solutions that should get you into the game!

Give me a heads up if you are still seeing issues!

it still wouldn't start i opened up a custom and these are the logs from it

Hmm...if none of the steps in that article helped, then we will probably have to pour through some logs and take an in-depth and exhaustive look at your network.  In order for us to help out with that, make sure to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and include the following information in it as well:

1) [Network Analysis](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq1)

2) [Network Information Log](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq4)

3) [Process List](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3)

We should be able to get this figured out and resolved!

@DARTGNAN, I am sorry to piggy back off another forum, but would you mind seeing if you can figure out what is going on for some players in this other forum? http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/j2m2JyRq-i-cant-get-into-a-game?comment=0006         We are all having the same issues, and it is really tough to figure out.
